entry.title: WIND WARNING , Gaspé
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:29 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Gaspé

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -17.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gaspé Airport 1:00 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -17.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.3 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 60 %
Wind Chill: -31
Dewpoint: -23.1°C
Wind: WNW 50 km/h gust 81 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 90. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 31 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
